author: cbs8
title: Attend Newberry College Homecoming and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites
text:
Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry, SC offers convenient lodging for Newberry College Homecoming on October 10, 2015.
 NEWBERRY, SC, October 05, Alumni and football fans attending Newberry College Homecoming on October 10 will find convenient lodging at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry South Carolina hotel . Newberry's 2015 homecoming game against Mars Hill College will kickoff at 4pm. Other weekend festivities will include a parade, pep rally, alumni lawn party, and post game fireworks.
"We welcome Newberry College football fans to our award winning hotel," shares Ambria Lanteigne, General Manager at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites. "We are located just minutes from the Newberry campus and Setzler Field," continues Ms. Lanteigne.
This hotel near Newberry College received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence for outstanding service. Comfortable guest rooms feature a microwave, mini refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. Travelers will enjoy a restful night's sleep on Simply Smart beds. Property amenities include a fitness center, 24-hour business center, and sundry shop in the lobby. Guests can start the day out right at the complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar, featuring signature cinnamon rolls, Smart Roast coffee, and other breakfast favorites.
Current lodging specials at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry include the Romantic Escape Package and the In-Room Pizza Package. AAA, senior, and military discounts are available. IHG Rewards Club members will earn points toward free hotel nights. The hotel is located off I-26 at Exit 76, just outside historic downtown Newberry.
For more information on Newberry College Homecoming activities, visit www.newberry.edu . To book your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry SC hotel , call 803-321-3955 or visit www.NEWBERRYSOUTHCAROLINAHOTEL.com .
About Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel Newberry
The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel in Newberry is the premier choice among Newberry South Carolina hotels. They are conveniently located at exit 76 off of I-26, about 30 minutes north of Columbia and less than an hour south of Greenville, SC. This Newberry SC hotel has outstanding amenities, including an indoor pool, whirlpool and Fitness Center. Guest should be sure to stop by their complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar each morning for delights like their signature cinnamon rolls and Smart Roast coffee. Few other Newberry South Carolina hotels can provide travelers with these perks backed by the reputable name they trust. "Stay Smart" at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel.
For more information visit: http://www.NewberrySouthCarolinaHotel.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
